sys_openapi_operation.name: Gets all the Crowding data (static) for the StopPointId, plus crowding data for a given line and optionally a particular direction.

openapi.display_value: Transport for London Unified API - v1

sys_openapi_operation.sys_name: Gets all the Crowding data (static) for the StopPointId, plus crowding data for a given line and optionally a particular direction.
